original_text: On the fifth day of the month (it was the fifth year of the exile of King Jehoiachin),
korean_text: 여호야긴 왕이 사로잡힌 지 오 년 그 달 초닷새라

sentences.original_text: On the fifth day of the month
it was the fifth year of the exile of King Jehoiachin
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 여호야긴의 포로 생활 다섯째 해였습니다
